snippet: The high-achieving charter school network is altering a feature that has distinguished it from New York City’s regular public schools but has also made it hard to retain teachers.
abstract: Charter school network Success Academy says it will shorten its school day in 2016, altering feature that distinguished school system from others but created difficulty in retaining teachers.
lead_paragraph: The high-achieving charter school network is altering a feature that has distinguished it from New York City’s regular public schools but has also made it hard to retain teachers.

headline.main: Success Academy Network to Shorten Its School Day Next Year
headline.print_headline: Success Academy Network to Shorten Its School Day Next Year
